experiences.description: Proactively liaised with the design team and project manager to ensure efficient and timely delivery of significant projects. Analyzed existing web applications and identified opportunities to enhance functionality and improve the user experience.

Proficiently troubleshot simple and complex technological issues for different assigned projects, achieving over 95% customer satisfaction rate. Enhanced the application's features to effectively fix the bugs and optimize the overall performance, reliability, and efficiency.
Analysing user requirements, Developed front-end and back-end both of the web applications and Designing and developing APIs
Developed full-stack web applications which processed, analyzed, and rendered data visually. Managed time-sensitive updates, including content changes and database upgrades
Developing new requirements of the product and deploying on server. Creating servers and databases for functionality

myDetails.About Me: I'm a motivated full-stack web developer, specializing in PHP, Laravel, and Vue.js with experience building scalable applications across diverse domains. Proficient in developing databases, creating user interfaces, writing and testing codes, troubleshooting simple/complex issues, and implementing new features based on user feedback. As a team lead, I've managed teams, aided developers in problem-solving, and am passionate about collaborative techniques fostering team growth and superior product development. I value clean, scalable code, participate in code reviews, and aim for long-term solutions.
myDetails.Skill Heading: I am a full stack developer, specialize mainly in backend technologies. I know PHP and Laravel framework very well, also working on frontend with Vue.js framework. I take care of details and high code quality, using tools that help to format and analyze application code. Some of my skills are PHP, Laravel, JavaScript ES6, Vue.js, Vuetify, MySQL, graphQl, Vue Apollo.Others: Linux, Docker, VPS Server Amazon Web Services (AWS), Digitalocean, Git, REST API, Agile/Scrum.Having remote job experience.
myDetails.Having experience on: Bootstrap (4 years), JavaScript (5 years), React JS (3 years), Node JS (3 years), Express JS (3 years), MongoDB(3 years), PHP (5 years), Laravel (5 years), MySQL (5 years), Vue JS (3 years)
